attributes.action: Make Sanitary Products free for women aged 12-45.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Women spend a ridiculous amount of money each year on sanitary products. Why should we have to pay for something that is a fact of life. Say a woman spends approximately £10 a month on sanitary products thats £120.00 a year!!!

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
